sense.def:
To drive a vehicle
pomeni obvladovati vozilo, da gre tja, kamor hočemo.

seg.quote: It is her turn to drive the car.
I have never learned to drive.

sense.def:
To drive someone somewhere
pomeni nekoga nekam peljati z avtomobilom.

seg.quote: Can I drive you to the airport?

sense.def:
A drive
je potovanje z vozilom, na primer avtomobilom.

seg.quote: It'll be a thirty mile drive.

sense.def:
A drive
je tudi zasebna cesta, ki pelje od javne ceste do hiše.

seg.quote: There were several cars parked in the drive.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
drives a machine
, tisto daje stroju energijo, tako da ga poganja.

seg.quote: Steam can be used to drive generators.

sense.def:
To drive a post or a nail into something
pomeni pognati kol ali žebelj v podlago tako, da po njem tolčemo s kladivom.

Kadar so ljudje ali živali
driven somewhere
ali
driven to do something
, so prisiljeni nekam iti ali nekaj storiti.

seg.quote: Half a million people had been driven out.
The farming venture drove the company into debt.

sense.def:
Če je nekdo
driven by a feeling or need
, ga čustvo ali potreba prisilita, da se vede tako, kot se vede.

seg.quote: ...a man driven by greed or envy.
Northcliffe had great ability and drive.

sense.def:
A drive
je tudi posebni napor skupine ljudi, da bi nekaj dosegla.

seg.quote: The Poles launched a tremendous investment drive.

sense.def:
Če razumemo, kaj nekdo
is driving at
, razumemo, kaj poskuša povedati.

seg.quote: She knew at once what I was driving at.
